name: cider
title: Cider
description: The official Raycast Cider extension, use this extension to control your playback including play/pause, shuffle, search for new songs, and more!
author: cidercollective

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play
commands.description: Continues or starts playback from where you last left off.

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause
commands.description: Pauses playback where you last left off.

commands.name: stop
commands.title: Stop Playback
commands.description: Stops playback and resets the progress of the current track.

commands.name: playpause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.description: Toggles between play and pause depending on the current state.

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next Track
commands.description: Plays the next track (if applicable) in the queue.

commands.name: previous
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.description: Returns to the previous played track.

commands.name: toggle-autoplay
commands.title: Toggle Autoplay
commands.description: Toggles the Autoplay setting in Cider.

commands.name: add-to-library
commands.title: Add to Library
commands.description: Adds the currently playing song to library.
